old: 修練の祠前の崖下にいる白衛騎士団員と話す

old: 敵ガード中に斬り崩しを成功せよ
new: Break the enemy's guard stance with your charged attack

old: 盾で敵の攻撃をガードせよ
new: Guard and block when the enemy attacks

old: 最深部のゴブリンを全滅せよ
new: Defeat the remaining Goblins in the inner sanctum
